trans-unit.source: Represents a key-level node in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 注册表中的项级节点。

trans-unit.source: This class is a registry encapsulation.
trans-unit.target: 此类是注册表封装。

trans-unit.source: Closes the key and flushes it to disk if its contents have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 关闭该项并将其刷新到磁盘如果其内容进行了修改。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on system keys will have no effect, because system keys are never closed.
trans-unit.target: 在系统项上调用此方法不会产生不起作用，因为永远不会关闭系统密钥。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing if you call it on an instance of `RegistryKey` that is already closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例上调用的此方法不执行任何操作`RegistryKey`已关闭的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new subkey or opens an existing subkey for write access.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新子项或打开一个现有子项以进行写访问。

trans-unit.source: In order to perform this action, the user must have permission at this level and below in the registry hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，用户必须具有注册表层次结构中的权限在此级别和更低版本。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not expose <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不会公开<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式的对象。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不允许调用方输入任意键或值。

trans-unit.source: The name or path of the subkey to create or open.
trans-unit.target: 名称或要创建或打开的子项的路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The newly created subkey, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的子项中，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果操作失败。

trans-unit.source: If a zero-length string is specified for subkey, the current object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个零长度字符串，指定为 subkey ，当前返回对象。

trans-unit.source: subkey is .
trans-unit.target: subkeyis .

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to create or open the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 用户没有创建或打开注册表项所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> on which this method is being invoked is closed (closed keys cannot be accessed).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"> </xref>上其调用此方法关闭 （不能访问已关闭的项）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> cannot be written to; for example, it was not opened as a writable key , or the user does not have the necessary access rights.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"> </xref>无法写入; 例如，它不打开作为可写的键，或者用户没有必要的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The nesting level exceeds 510.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套级别超过 510 层。

trans-unit.source: -or- A system error occurred, such as deletion of the key, or an attempt to create a key in the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine"></xref> root.
trans-unit.target: -发生系统错误，例如删除了项，或者尝试创建中的键<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine"></xref>根。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new subkey or opens an existing subkey for write access, using the specified permission check option.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新子项或打开一个现有子项以进行写访问，使用指定的权限检查选项。

trans-unit.source: In order to perform this action, the user must have permission at this level and below in the registry hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，用户必须具有注册表层次结构中的权限在此级别和更低版本。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not expose <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不会公开<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式的对象。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不允许调用方输入任意键或值。

trans-unit.source: In order to use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenSubKey%2A> method, you must have an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenSubKey%2A>方法，你必须有<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>类</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>的实例</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenSubKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get an instance of <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>, use one of the static members of the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取其实例<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry>类</xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry>的静态成员之一</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: The name or path of the subkey to create or open.
trans-unit.target: 名称或要创建或打开的子项的路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，用于指定打开该项是是否进行读取或读/写访问。

trans-unit.target: 新创建的子项中，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果操作失败。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new subkey or opens an existing subkey for write access, using the specified permission check option and registry security.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新子项或打开一个现有子项以进行写访问，使用指定的权限检查选项和注册表安全性。

trans-unit.source: The CreateSubKey method creates a registry key that has the access control specified by the `registrySecurity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: CreateSubKey 方法创建一个具有指定的访问控制的注册表项`registrySecurity`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> object that is returned represents the registry key, but that object is not restricted by the access control specified in the `registrySecurity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>返回对象表示的注册表项，但该对象不受中指定的访问控制`registrySecurity`参数。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: If `permissionCheck` is <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>, the key is opened for read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 如果`permissionCheck`是<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>，则打开该项进行读/写访问。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `permissionCheck` is <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>, the key is opened for read access.
trans-unit.target: 如果`permissionCheck`是<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>，打开该项是进行读取访问。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For backward compatibility, the key is opened for reading and writing if `permissionCheck` is <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName> and the parent key also has <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取和写入如果打开该项是为了向后兼容， `permissionCheck` ，而且<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>父项还具有<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the parent key has any other setting, read/write status is controlled by the parent key's setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果父项具有任何其他设置，由父项的设置控制读/写状态。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`在完成使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>时

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法使<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>中不可用状态。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>占用。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用`Dispose`在发布到<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: Writes all the attributes of the specified open registry key into the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的打开注册表项的所有属性都写入到注册表。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to call `Flush` to write out changes to a key.
trans-unit.target: 不需要调用`Flush`写出对项的更改。

trans-unit.source: Registry changes are flushed to disk when the registry uses its lazy flusher.
trans-unit.target: 注册表更改刷新到磁盘时注册表使用其惰性刷新器。

trans-unit.source: Lazy flushing occurs automatically and regularly after a system-specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: 系统指定的时间间隔后，惰性刷新则会自动地定期。

trans-unit.source: Registry changes are also flushed to disk at system shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 注册表更改也会刷新到磁盘上的系统关闭。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A>, the `Flush` function returns only when all the data has been written to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A>、`Flush`函数将返回仅当所有数据已都写入到注册表。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Flush` function might also write out parts of or all of the other keys.
trans-unit.target: `Flush`函数还可能写出的部分或所有其他键。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function excessively can have a negative effect on an application's performance.
trans-unit.target: 过度调用此函数可以产生负面影响对应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: An application should only call `Flush` if it must be absolute certain that registry changes are recorded to disk.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应只调用`Flush`如果它必须是绝对某些注册表更改记录到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: In general, `Flush` rarely, if ever, need be used.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，`Flush`极少数情况下，需要使用如果曾经。

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 注册表项可以具有不与任何名称关联的一个值。

trans-unit.source: When the GetValue method retrieves expandable string values (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法检索可扩展字符串值时 (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>)，它就会展开环境字符串使用本地环境中的数据。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve expandable string values from the registry on a remote computer, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29> method overload to specify that you do not want environment strings expanded.
trans-unit.target: 若要从远程计算机上的注册表中检索可扩展字符串值，使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29>方法重载来指定不希望展开环境字符串。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>), rather than as an expandable string (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>), GetValue does not expand it.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果包含对环境变量的可展开引用的值已存储为 string (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>)，而不是可扩展字符串 (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>)，GetValue 不展开它。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 已检索到它通过调用后，你可以展开此类字符串<xref:System.Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables%2A>方法。</xref:System.Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The recommended way to retrieve data from the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData> key is to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> class rather than the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要从中检索数据的建议的方法<xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData>密钥是使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>类而不是<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.Registry.PerformanceData>

trans-unit.source: Rather than throwing an exception, this method returns `null` if the requested key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 而不是引发异常，此方法返回`null`如果请求的项不存在。

trans-unit.source: If `permissionCheck` is <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>, the key is opened for reading and writing; if `permissionCheck` is <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>, the key is opened for reading unless the parent key was opened with <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`permissionCheck`是<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>，则打开该项进行读取和写入; 如果`permissionCheck` <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>，除非<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>已打开的父项，打开的注册表项以进行读取</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName></xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>或</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The access specified for `permissionCheck` takes precedence over the access specified for `rights`.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的访问权限`permissionCheck`优先于为指定的访问权限`rights`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName> for `permissionCheck` and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights?displayProperty=fullName> for `rights`, an attempt to write to the subkey throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>为`permissionCheck`和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights?displayProperty=fullName>为`rights`，尝试写入到子项引发异常。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Applies Windows access control security to an existing registry key.
trans-unit.target: 适用于现有的注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性。

trans-unit.source: To modify permissions for a registry key, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object representing the existing Windows access control security, modify that <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object, and then use the SetAccessControl method to update security for the key.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的注册表项的权限，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来获取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>表示现有的 Windows 访问控制安全性的对象，修改该<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>对象，，然后使用 SetAccessControl 方法以更新项安全性。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object specified for `registrySecurity` replaces the existing security for the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;><xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>对象指定的用于`registrySecurity`替换注册表项的现有安全性。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing access control security, and then modify it.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的新用户的权限，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A>方法以获取现有的访问控制安全性，，然后修改它。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The access control security to apply to the current subkey.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于当前子项的访问控制安全性。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref> object represents a key with access control security, and the caller does not have <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> rights.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey"></xref>对象表示一个密钥与访问控制安全性，并且调用方没有<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>权限。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `name` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set.
trans-unit.target: 由于多个值可以存储在注册表中的每个项，你必须使用`name`参数来指定你想要设置的特定值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 注册表项可以具有不与任何名称关联的一个值。

trans-unit.source: When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表编辑器中显示了此未命名的值，而不是名称将显示字符串"（默认值）"。

trans-unit.source: To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`name`。

trans-unit.source: In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access.
trans-unit.target: 若要在密钥中设置值，必须具有写访问权限来打开密钥。

trans-unit.source: After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key.
trans-unit.target: 具有写访问权限打开一个键后，你可以更改任何该注册表项中的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`name`不存在的项中创建和关联的值设置为`value`。

trans-unit.source: This overload of <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A> stores 64-bit integers as strings (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>将 64 位整数存储为字符串 (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>)。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To store 64-bit numbers as <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> values, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29> overload that specifies <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>.
trans-unit.target: 作为<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>值，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29>重载，它指定<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind></xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29></xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>存储 64 位数字

trans-unit.source: This overload of <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A> stores all string values as <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>, even if they contain expandable references to environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>存储所有的字符串值作为<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>，即使它们包含对环境变量的可展开引用。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To save string values as expandable strings (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>), use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29> overload that specifies <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>.
trans-unit.target: 若要保存为可展开的字符串的字符串值 (<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>)，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29>重载，它指定<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind%29> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Numeric types other than 32-bit integers are stored as strings by this method overload.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方法重载以字符串形式存储以外 32 位整数的数值类型。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration elements are stored as strings containing the element names.
trans-unit.target: 枚举元素存储为包含的元素名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not expose <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不会公开<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式的对象。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不允许调用方输入任意键或值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 上 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 注册表不是 Unicode，而不是所有 Unicode 字符都是有效的所有代码页。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match.
trans-unit.target: 对于当前的代码页无效的 Unicode 字符都替换为最佳的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a name/value pair in the registry key, using the specified registry data type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的注册表数据类型的注册表项中设置的名称/值对的值。

trans-unit.source: Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `name` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name.

trans-unit.source: When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name.

trans-unit.source: To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`name`。

trans-unit.source: In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access.
trans-unit.target: 若要在密钥中设置值，必须具有写访问权限来打开密钥。

trans-unit.source: After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key.
trans-unit.target: 具有写访问权限打开一个键后，你可以更改任何该注册表项中的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created, and the associated value is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`name`不存在的项，它创建，并且相关联的值设置为`value`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Specifying the registry data type <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind> is the same as using the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 指定的注册表数据类型<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>等同于使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>重载。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind>

trans-unit.source: If the type of the specified `value` does not match the specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的类型`value`不匹配指定`valueKind`，和数据不能转换，<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can store a <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName> as a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>, but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以存储<xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName>作为<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>，但仅当其值为一种<xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>的最大值小于</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You cannot store a single string value as a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 不能将单个字符串值存储为一种<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If boxed values are passed for <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>, the conversion is done using the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果都传递装箱的值<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>，完成转换后使用固定区域性。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not expose <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不会公开<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式的对象。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不允许调用方输入任意键或值。

trans-unit.target: 检索当前项的子项计数。

trans-unit.target: 它只返回调用它的基级上的名称的计数。

trans-unit.target: 每个注册表项具有不与任何名称相关联的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This unnamed value can be set by using the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A> method and specifying either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`.
trans-unit.target: 此未命名的值可以通过使用设置<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>方法并指定`null`或为空字符串 ("") 为`name`。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the default value has never been set, it does not contribute to the total count returned by the ValueCount property; once it has been set, however, it is always counted.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有永远不会设置默认值，它不影响 ValueCount 属性中; 返回的总计数一旦设置，但是，则将始终计。

trans-unit.target: 用户没有必要的注册表权限。

trans-unit.source: A system error occurred, for example the current key has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 出现系统错误，例如当前项已被删除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view that was used to create the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建注册表项的视图。

trans-unit.source: On the 64-bit versions of Windows, portions of the registry are stored separately for 32-bit and 64-bit applications.
trans-unit.target: 在 64 位版本的 Windows 中，对于 32 位和 64 位应用程序可以单独存储注册表的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: There is a 32-bit view for 32-bit applications and a 64-bit view for 64-bit applications.
trans-unit.target: 有了 32 位应用程序的 32 位视图和 64 位应用程序的 64 位视图。

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that the view always corresponds to the actual view of the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>.
trans-unit.target: 不会假定其视图始终对应于<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>的实际视图

trans-unit.source: The view that was used to create the registry key.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建注册表项的视图。

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryView"></xref>, if no view was used.
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryView"> </xref>，如果已使用无视图。
